alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Schenectady; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 8:00AM EST until December 19 at 10:50PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schoharie Creek at Burtonsville. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. Water reaches homes in Lost Valley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM EST Monday the stage was 3.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 8.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schoharie Creek Burtonsville Flood Stage: 6.0 Observed Stage at Mon 6 am: 3.3 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 5.2 Mon 7 pm 7.1 Tue 1 am 8.0 Tue 7 am 7.5 Tue 1 pm 6.7 Tue 7 pm 5.6 Wed 1 am 4.9 Wed 7 am 4.5 Wed 1 pm 4.1 Wed 7 pm 3.7 Thu 1 am 3.5 &&
